argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | grpdivf.1 | |- X = ran G |
| 2 |  | grpdivf.3 | |- D = ( /g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> G e. GrpOp ) |
| 4 |  | #P_simpr1 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> A e. X ) |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_grpodivcl | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) -> ( B D C ) e. X ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_3adant3r1 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( B D C ) e. X ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( inv ` G ) = ( inv ` G ) |
| 8 | 1, 7, 2 | #P_grpodivval | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ ( B D C ) e. X ) -> ( A D ( B D C ) ) = ( A G ( ( inv ` G ) ` ( B D C ) ) ) ) |
| 9 | 3, 4, 6, 8 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( A D ( B D C ) ) = ( A G ( ( inv ` G ) ` ( B D C ) ) ) ) |
| 10 | 1, 7, 2 | #P_grpoinvdiv | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) -> ( ( inv ` G ) ` ( B D C ) ) = ( C D B ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_3adant3r1 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( inv ` G ) ` ( B D C ) ) = ( C D B ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( A G ( ( inv ` G ) ` ( B D C ) ) ) = ( A G ( C D B ) ) ) |
| 13 | 9, 12 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( A D ( B D C ) ) = ( A G ( C D B ) ) ) |
